reviewText: I use this True Story to teach my 8th Grade Health students about acceptance.  The students respond to it each time.
A little short on ideas of how to deal with bullying other than a major law suit.

I teach both Bullying and Tolerance subjects, and am planning on using this video for the junior high students to whom I present.  Homophobic bullying is an important topic, and this is useful to initiate discussion.
All institutions in our society, especially schools, must respect the human and civil rights of  people.  Jamie Nabozny's court ruling is a victory for all of humanity.
